top_opportunities.question: Will Spain win the 2026 FIFA World Cup?
top_opportunities.description:
This market will resolve according to the national team that wins the 2026 FIFA World Cup.

top_opportunities.question: MegaETH market cap (FDV) >$2B one day after launch?
top_opportunities.description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Fully Diluted Valuation of MegaETH's token is greater than $2,000,000,000 1 day after launch. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No."

top_opportunities.question: Will the U.S. collect between $200b and $500b in revenue in 2025?
top_opportunities.description:
